query.sql: select distinct c.card_id/*, c2.status_id, c2.template_id*/ from card c join attribute_value av1 on av1.attribute_code in ('ADMIN_222990') and av1.card_id = c.card_id join attribute_value av_changed on av_changed.card_id = c.card_id and av_changed.attribute_code ='CHANGED' join card c2 on c2.card_id = av1.number_value and c2.template_id = 704 join attribute_value av2 on av2.card_id = c2.card_id and av2.attribute_code in ('ADMIN_222147') where av2.value_id in (2127, 1581) and c2.status_id in (556656, 10000001, 10000002, 10000000) and c.template_id = 364 and c.status_id = 101 AND (av_changed.date_value >= (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - (interval '7 days'))) AND (av_changed.date_value <= (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + (interval '1 days')))
